title: tA ninadu karuNai
sahitya:
tA ninadu karuNai enadu guru sAmi nAtha shiva SaNmukhanE guhanE


anupallavi

  vA kanaka mayil mEl manamagizha vanden kavalai iruL sindak-kandappA


caraNam    nAnAnenum Anava nATakam aDangiDa naccup-paghaiyoDunga narakak-kavalai tIrat-
tEnAr erum unadu tiruppugamUTrinilE cittam kuLittu jIvan shuddhAnandam peravE
